job.title: Software Documentation Engineer
job.description: Position Software Documentation EngineerbrbrWill be responsible for all commercial and project needs for Telkom Tribe Travel Tourism wonderinid  travelajaidbrbrQualificationbrbr Min 1 years experience in same or related positionbr Experienced in creating software documentation and diagram such as Usecase UML Flowchart Activity Diagram user guide system documentation testing documentation etcbr Good Knowledge of Database ERD DFD or other Data modelbr Familiar with ConfluenceJIRA Database API and Agile Methodology such as Scrum or Kanban is a huge advantagebrbrJob Descriptionbrbr Create update and maintain all documentation each of software  product life cyclebr write script diagrams and so forth for helping others to understand a system workbr Within a crossfunctional team collaborate with other developers software architect quality assurance UI designer UX researcher product owner and scrum masterbr Scripting for API Documentation and Mockupbr Learn multiple tools for the jobbr Create data model diagram workflow and so forth to assist technical team
